data.message: As much as I would love to think this will actually reach YOU, whatever you want us to call you .. but I am on to you and why you're doing this, I just wanna say thank you so much for every thing you have been through to help change the world around for the better and I know you already know this but all your efforts and strife are NOT going in vain. I love you and I always have for you and the soul behind the man. <3                                  I just wanna thank you for sharing your energies, frequencies and vibrations.. not only did you help me get through this life time.. your shit worked man, if it weren't for you and Anthony Kiedis and everybody else, I wouldn't have gotten to know the immortal soul that we all are.. that I am. <3
